page.title: 20TRINITY HOUSE AT HARWICH
page.content:
HARWICH IS A MAJOR TRINITY HOUSE DEPOT. IT IS THE LARGEST OF THE 6 DEPOTS AND MAINTAINS OVER 700 BUOYS, AND ALSO LIGHTSHIPS, LANBYS AND LIGHTHOUSES. THERE ARE THREE TENDERS AT HARWICH FOR THIS PURPOSE WITH CREWS OF 30 ON EACH, WORKING A FORTNIGHT ON AND A FORTNIGHT OFF. THERE ARE ALSO 555 PILOTS, OF WHOM 111 WORK FROM HARWICH.THEY CARRIED OUT OVER 13,000 ACTS OF PILOTAGE IN 1983 USING THE 5 HARWICH PILOT CUTTERS.{
{ CREDITS:}SLIDES - GAVIN HINKS (6TH) TEXT: 1BT, THE HARWICH SCHOOL: STEVEN, DARREN, FELIPA, JANET, SARAH, LISA W.,NICOLA, ROGER, TERRY, AMANDA, LISA R., STUART, REBEKAH, LOUISE, SARAH S., JAMES, GARY, MARCUS, SHAY, AARON, ROBERT, REBECCA, LUCY AND LEE. COORDINATOR : MR. P. COWLEY.
